articles.title: ZEYNEP TUFEKCI: Texas measles outbreak is even scarier than it looks - WRAL News
articles.description: Tuesday, March 4, 2025 -- Some Americans live deep in echo chambers where most of what they hear about vaccines are lies and disdain. It won't be possible to reverse all this quickly. Perhaps the best we can do is inform parents skeptical of vaccines what the…
articles.content: EDITOR'S NOTE: Zeynep Tufekci, a New York Times columnist, was a professor at the UNC School of Information and Library Science and now is a professor of sociology and public affairs at Princeton Uni… [+7560 chars]
